sentence.Network_en: The battle sputtered to a halt in mid-October.
sentence.Network_cn: 战斗于10月中旬渐渐停了下来。

sentence.Network_en: When spring came in mid - October 1520, Magellan led his ships south once more.
sentence.Network_cn: 在1520年10月 中旬 春天来临之际, 麦哲伦带着他的船队再次往南航行.

sentence.Network_en: I know it's mid October but I'm not sure yet about our requirements.
sentence.Network_cn: 我知道现在 已经 是十月中旬了,可我对明年的需要情况心里还没底.

auth_sentence.content: BCC's usually develop in mid to late life.
auth_sentence.res_content: BCC's usually develop in mid to late life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: BCC's usually develop in mid to late life.

auth_sentence.content: Teary, mid-paced pleas for a lover's forgiveness.
auth_sentence.res_content: Teary, mid-paced pleas for a lover's forgiveness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Teary, mid-paced pleas for a lover's forgiveness.

auth_sentence.content: I have never seen him caught at mid-on before.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have never seen him caught at mid-on before.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have never seen him caught at mid-on before.
